Sec. 11-31. Scope of regulation and definitions.
Scope. This article will be applicable to and govern all employers located or doing business within Miami-Dade County who have employees summoned to jury duty within Miami-Dade County.
Definitions. [As used in this article the following terms shall have the meanings respectively ascribed:]
means an individual or business organization that employs at least ten (10) employees as defined in this section.
means an individual employed by an employer and regularly scheduled to work at least thirty-five (35) hours per week.
means the employee's regular salary, draw, or compensation, but does not include commissions, overtime pay, or compensation for more than eight (8) working hours per day.
